MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY5 postcode area of Lochgelly, affecting properties in Hill Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:14am. Our engineers have arrived on iste and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:19am on the 12th of March 2021
